    • generatePayroll

      public void generatePayroll(int employeeId, double basicSalary, double overtimePay, double deductions)
      Description copied from interface: IPayrollService
      Generates the payroll using below parameters
      Specified by:
      generatePayroll in interface IPayrollService
      Parameters:
      employeeId - for which the Payroll is being generated
      basicSalary - the Base salary amount
      overtimePay - additional pay amount for overtime
      deductions - total of amount deductions levied by the employer on account of (Prof. Tax, Consumer Loans, EPF etc)
